member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_BUFFERING_PARAMS
member.summary: Specifies the buffering parameters for a network byte stream.

member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_BUFFERING_PARAMS.cbTotalFileSize
member.summary: Size of the file, in bytes. If the total size is unknown, set this member to -1.

member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_BUFFERING_PARAMS.cbPlayableDataSize
member.summary: Size of the playable media data in the file, excluding any trailing data that is not useful for playback. If this value is unknown, set this member to -1.

member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_BUFFERING_PARAMS.prgBuckets
member.summary: Pointer to an array of structures. Each member of the array gives the buffer window for a particular bit rate.

member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_BUFFERING_PARAMS.cBuckets
member.summary: The number of elements in the prgBuckets array.

member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_BUFFERING_PARAMS.qwNetBufferingTime
member.summary: Amount of data to buffer from the network, in 100-nanosecond units. This value is in addition to the buffer windows defined in the prgBuckets member.

member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_BUFFERING_PARAMS.qwExtraBufferingTimeDuringSeek
member.summary: Amount of additional data to buffer when seeking, in 100-nanosecond units. This value reflects the fact that downloading must start from the previous key frame before the seek point. If the value is unknown, set this member to zero.

member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_BUFFERING_PARAMS.qwPlayDuration
member.summary: The playback duration of the file, in 100-nanosecond units. If the duration is unknown, set this member to zero.
